name: vImage.Error
desc: An error that occurs during a vImage operation.

items.name: case bufferSizeMismatch
items.desc: An error indicating that the function requires the source and destination buffers to have the same size, but they don’t.

items.name: case colorSyncIsAbsent
items.desc: An error indicating that the ColorSync framework is missing.

items.name: case coreVideoIsAbsent
items.desc: An error indicating that the Core Video framework is missing.

items.name: case internalError
items.desc: A serious error occurred inside vImage, which prevented vImage from continuing.

items.name: case invalidCVImageFormat
items.desc: An error indicating that a Core Video format is invalid.

items.name: case invalidEdgeStyle
items.desc: An error indicating that the specified edge style is invalid.

items.name: case invalidImageFormat
items.desc: An error indicating that a specified Core Graphics or Core Video format is invalid.

items.name: case invalidImageObject
items.desc: An error indicating that a specified Core Graphics image or Core Video pixel buffer is invalid.

items.name: case invalidKernelSize
items.desc: An error indicating that either the kernel height, the kernel width, or both, are even.

items.name: case invalidOffset_X
items.desc: An error indicating that the parameter that specifies the left edge of the region of interest is greater than the width of the source image.

items.name: case invalidOffset_Y
items.desc: An error indicating that the parameter that specifies the top edge of the region of interest is greater than the height of the source image.

items.name: case invalidParameter
items.desc: An error indicating that a function parameter has an invalid value.

items.name: case invalidRowBytes
items.desc: An error indicating that the buffer’s row bytes field is invalid.

items.name: case memoryAllocationError
items.desc: An error indicating that an attempt to allocate memory failed.

items.name: case noError
items.desc: The vImage function completed without error.

items.name: case nullPointerArgument
items.desc: An error indicating that a pointer parameter is NULL and it must not be.

items.name: case outOfPlaceOperationRequired
items.desc: An error indicating that the source images and destination images alias the same image data, but must not.

items.name: case roiLargerThanInputBuffer
items.desc: An error indicating that the region of interest extends beyond the bottom edge or right edge of the source buffer.

items.name: case unknownFlagsBit
items.desc: An error indicating that a bit in the flags field isn’t supported.

items.name: case unsupportedConversion
items.desc: An error indicating that the requested conversion isn’t supported.
